Email.label: Email
Email.hint: Email is primarily used for Notifications and Cases

Alt_Email__c.label: Alternate Email
Alt_Email__c.hint: Alternate Email Address other than the main email address listed for the contact.

Addt_l_Email__c.label: Addt'l Email
Addt_l_Email__c.hint: Alternate Email Address other than the main email address listed for the contact.

Focus_Group_Invite__c.label: Focus Group Invite
Focus_Group_Invite__c.hint: Designated on contact sheet to be added to the Focus Group Invitation list

AutoNumber_Contact__c.label: AutoNumber_Contact
AutoNumber_Contact__c.hint: Unique ID/Key for updates in contact data

Do_Not_Replicate__c.label: Do Not Replicate
Do_Not_Replicate__c.hint: Checkbox is for 3rd party or generic contacts that should not replicate over to CMT

RidgeBranches__c.label: R_Ridge Branches
RidgeBranches__c.hint: Ridge Branches – enter Branch number / numbers this contact has access to followed by a comma (like 123,456)

Does_the_Contact_have_P3_user_id__c.label: Does the Contact have P3 user id?

Profile__c.label: Profile
picklist: Corr with ORD Agr - Order Entry Only
Corr with ORD Agr - Correct Only
Corr with ORD Agr - Foreign Order Entry Only
Corr wtih ORD Agr with N/A/Profile

Conversion_Date__c.label: Conversion Date
Conversion_Date__c.hint: must be populated to each office, date required if converting. Must be a date string as mm/dd/yyyy.

Happy_Factor__c.label: Happy Factor
picklist: Outstanding issues and not happy with time for completion, not exactly Happy
Outstanding issues but patiently waiting, Happy
RM needs to call this client to discuss issue, Critically Unhappy

Ridge_Correspondent__c.label: Ridge Correspondent
Ridge_Correspondent__c.hint: Please check the box if this account belongs to Ridge.

Contact_for_End_of_Day_File__c.label: Contact for End of Day File

FOCUS_Filing_Frequency__c.label: FOCUS Filing Frequency
FOCUS_Filing_Frequency__c.hint: How often correspondent files FOCUS Reorts.  CreditRisk@penson.com can verify the filing frequency

Location__c.label: Location #
Location__c.hint: BTS Location#  created for each firm during the onboarding process

TaxID_EIN__c.label: TaxID_EIN
TaxID_EIN__c.hint: Company Employer Identification number or Tax ID

R_Business_Line_Other__c.label: BusinessLineOther
R_Business_Line_Other__c.hint: Legacy Ridge Business Line Other Description

FRMSLS__c.label: FRMSLS
FRMSLS__c.hint: Salesgroups in Phase3 used in conjunction with FRMUSR

Office_MPID__c.label: Office MPID
Office_MPID__c.hint: The MPID of this office. This field is used only for Office, not for Correspondent.

Launch_Date__c.label: Launch Date
Launch_Date__c.hint: Expected live date. If launch date in future, account will not receive PIN notices.

Comments__c.label: Comments
Comments__c.hint: Ridge Legacy Comments high level description of the Client business – used for executive visits and Key Heads –Up notes
